biotools.summary: Allows you compare and annotate your own microarrays against other available arrays.  Comparison of arrays can be achieved within the same species as well as across species (array comparison is based on UniGene Cluster ID and/or Homologene data).  Annotation data includes LocusLink, SwissProt, and Gene Ontology.

bioschemas.name: KARMA
